HotelElement.Name: Residhome Genève Prévessin le Carre D'Or

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Residhome Le Carre d'Or Prevessin in Prevessin-Moens, you'll be close to CERN and Palexpo. This residence is within close proximity of Microcosm and Meyrin Commercial Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 135 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones and safes.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Prevessin-Moens? This residence has facilities measuring 269 square feet (25 square meters), including a meeting room.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Residhome Le Carre d'Or Prevessin is Geneva International Airport (GVA) - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Residhome Le Carre d'Or Prevessin is Geneva (GVA-Cointrin Intl.) - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi.
